title: A Great Leader Is A Great Servant | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: A Great Leader Is A Great Servant | Victoria Osteen
description:
God’s idea of greatness begins with service. When you use your power and authority to serve others, God will make sure you get everything back in abundance. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. 

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
